Class User

java.lang.Object
io.github.natanimn.telebof.types.chat_and_user.User
public class User extends Object
This object represents a Telegram user or bot.
Since:
3 March 2025
Version:
0.9
Author:
Natanim

  • Field Details

    • id

      public Long id
      Unique identifier for this user or bot.

    • is_bot

      public Boolean is_bot
      True, if this user is a bot

    • first_name

      public String first_name
      User's or bot's first name

    • last_name

      public String last_name
      Optional. User's or bot's last name

    • language_code

      public String language_code
      Optional.IETF language tag of the user's language

    • username

      public String username
      Optional. User's or bot's username

    • is_premium

      public Boolean is_premium
      Optional. True, if this user is a Telegram Premium user

    • added_to_attachment_menu

      public Boolean added_to_attachment_menu
      Optional. True, if this user added the bot to the attachment menu

    • can_join_groups

      public Boolean can_join_groups
      Optional. True, if the bot can be invited to groups. Returned only in BotContext.getMe().

    • can_read_all_group_messages

      public Boolean can_read_all_group_messages
      Optional. True, if privacy mode is disabled for the bot. Returned only in getMe.

    • supports_inline_queries

      public Boolean supports_inline_queries
      Optional. True, if the bot supports inline queries. Returned only in BotContext.getMe().

    • can_connect_to_business

      public Boolean can_connect_to_business
      Optional. True, if the bot can be connected to a Telegram Business account to receive its messages. Returned only in BotContext.getMe().

    • has_main_web_app

      public Boolean has_main_web_app
      Optional. True, if the bot has a main Web App. Returned only in BotContext.getMe().
